Interface EMContactListener


  • public interface EMContactListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onContactAdded(java.lang.String username)
      this api will be called when there is any contact added
      void onContactDeleted(java.lang.String username)
      this api will be called when some contacts of yours are deleted
      void onContactInvited(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String reason)
      this api will be called when you receive a friend application
      void onFriendRequestAccepted(java.lang.String username)
      this api will be called when your application is accepted
      void onFriendRequestDeclined(java.lang.String username)
      this api will be called when your application is refused

    • Method Detail

        this api will be called when there is any contact added

      • onContactInvited

        void onContactInvited(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String reason)
        this api will be called when you receive a friend application
        Parameters:
        username - User who asked to be friend of current user.
        reason - User's invite literal message.
